installedSkills.name: atlassian
installedSkills.description: Interact with Atlassian Jira and Confluence from the terminal. Search, create, and update Jira tickets; read, search, create, and update Confluence pages. Use when the user mentions Jira tickets, issues, work items, sprints, Confluence pages, documentation, or Atlassian in general.

installedSkills.name: project-start
installedSkills.description: Build shared understanding before building software: README → user journey → story map → architecture → AI context. Use when starting a new project, onboarding to an existing one, or when AI needs better context about what the project is and why it exists.
